title: Post Containing Slides with Interactive Code
text: This is a post that contains slides with interactive code on a Quarto Blog through the quarto-webr extension. The configuration setup for the quarto-webr extension is taken care of in the _quarto.yml file to avoid needing to re-specify options multiple times.

title: Post Containing Slides with Interactive Code
text:
Presentation






Important



For quarto-webr to work within RevealJS, you must use a pre-release version of Quarto that is 1.4.502 or greater that contains an updated copy of pandoc. For more details, please see Issue #14.

title: About
text: This blog is a demo showing how to use the quarto-webr extension.

title: Post With Interactive Code
text:
This is a post with interactive code on a Quarto Blog through the quarto-webr extension. The configuration setup for the quarto-webr extension is taken care of in the _quarto.yml file to avoid needing to re-specify options multiple times.


Please enable JavaScript to experience the dynamic code cell content on this page.
